name: Think and Survive
description:
A virus has spread released into the world.

At first, it was believed to be just a deadly virus, but then they found out that the dead were brought back to life.

Your goal is to survive, once again trying to find refuge and survivors.

You can try to pass through large hordes of zombies or you can try to kill all of them using everything you have.

Eeverything depends only on you.

Main character: Arnold Klingelhofer

      Former soldier, decorated with honourable medal, struggles to find a cure for this deadly virus that brings the dead to life.

      Everything he ever wanted after he gave up soldier life was to have a quiet life but unfortunately this dream was destroyed by this deadly virus.

      Its new goal in life is to find an antidote to save mankind.

Main enemy character:  Allen Russo (Clones)

      One of the world's greatest biologists, Allen Russo, worked with his team on a cancer-curing microbe, unfortunately his studies turned into a biological weapon of mass destruction.

      After releasing the deadly virus, he managed to escape and hide somewhere in the world without anyone knowing where he might be hiding.

Rules: 

Survive, kill all the zombies and escape alive.

In game controls: 

W,A,S,D - for movement
Left Click and Right Click- shoot
